Articles.Content:
Thaniel here. I got pulled in by the gravity of this thing called the Kerbal space program (shiny things that go boom very very high up over ground).

Anyway, I come from a long career with Orbiter, so the lack of information is somewhat unfamiliar, but not necesarily a problem.

The ability to build my own contraptions for flying of parts made up of pieces just lying around is great fun. And being able to maybe contribute to add in usefull ideas is intriguing. So far, it looks really really promising

IÂ´ve have been working on a game loosely based on a combination of millenium 2.2, deuterous and BARIS, with the newest iteration resembling very little on the previous games, as it have evolved and developed on itÂ´s own. ItÂ´s focused heavily on the engneering bit, and have a 4 layer techtree sollution, where the pieces are specified by the player, and only theorys/overlaying technology can be researched. And where proper testing of the engineered parts will be a good thing. And if IÂ´m lucky, there will even be graphics in it.

Anyway, IÂ´m here, and fun is about to be had.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
